info.name: Clean Wikia
info.description: Removes wikia navigation (e.g. links to other wikia wikis), ads, and makes content full-width.
info.additionalInfo:
Changelog
07/30/2017 - Long-overdue update
09/24/2015 - Remove padding that was causing the right side of articles to be cut off a bit
12/30/2013 - Fix search box autocomplete being cut off on article pages
12/05/2013 - Update for "WikiaPage V2"
07/29/2013 - Fixed Ripdog's overzealous removal of navigation
07/29/2013 - Fix search bar text not showing up in Firefox - thanks PartiallyCorrect
07/29/2013 - Merge patch from Ripdog containing Firefox compatibility fix and topbar removal - thanks!

10/04/2012 - Updated for Wikia redesign
